events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the Software Engineer position within our development team.
The candidate's application was categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software and developer in the resume.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to handle the Software Engineer application and will coordinate further steps.
Initial screening completed via phone call; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Technical interview was scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 14:00 UTC with the engineering team to assess coding skills.
